units.name: Custodian Guard
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: guardian spear.

datasheet.name: Stand Vigil
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Sentinel Storm
datasheet.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, it can shoot again.|Datasheet||

wargear.name: Praesidium Shield
wargear.description: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

wargear.name: Vexilla
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

units.name: Venerable Contemptor Dreadnought
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: combi-bolter; multi-melta; Contemptor combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Unyielding Ancient
datasheet.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.|Datasheet||

units.name: Venerable Land Raider
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 godhammer lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Assault Ramp
datasheet.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: Trajann Valoris
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Watcher’s Axe.

datasheet.name: Captain-General
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic skill or Weapon skill characteristics and/or all modifiers to the Hit roll|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Moment Shackle
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, you can select one of the following to take effect until the end of the phase:This model’s Watcher’s Axe melee weapon has an Attacks characteristic of 12.This model has a 2+ invulnerable save.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: SUPREME COMMANDER
datasheet.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Shield-captain
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: guardian spear.

datasheet.name: Master of the Stances
datasheet.description: Once per battle, when this models unit is selected to fight, it can use this ability. if it does until that fight is resolved, both Ka’tah Stances are active for that unit, instead of only one.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Strategic Mastery
datasheet.description: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability. That model’s unit can be targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Auramite and Adamantine
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability If it does, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to this model, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1.

datasheet.name: Strategic Mastery
datasheet.description: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability and target that model’s unit with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.|Datasheet||

units.name: Shield-captain On Dawneagle Jetbike
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: salvo launcher; interceptor lance.

datasheet.name: Sweeping Advance
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the end of the Fight phase, if this model’s unit has fought this phase, if it is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Fall Back move or, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Strategic Mastery
datasheet.description: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability and target that model’s unit with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.|Datasheet||

units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: guardian spear.

datasheet.name: Resolute Will
datasheet.description: While a CHARACTER is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Living Fortress
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.|Datasheet||

wargear.name: Vexilla
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

datasheet.name: Slayers of Tyrants
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER, MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: From Golden Light
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.|Datasheet||

wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

datasheet.name: Turbo-boost
datasheet.description:
Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.|Datasheet||
000001454|3|||Quicksilver Execution|Once per battle, after this unit ends a Normal Move or Advance move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE units) that it moved over during that move, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Implacable Vanguard
datasheet.description:
Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.|Datasheet||

core.name: Tactical Perception
core.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.
core.parameter: 000002088 | 4 | | | Tactical Perception | While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Tenacious Spirit
core.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength.
core.parameter: 000002088 | 5 | | | Tenacious Spirit | While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Daughter of the Abyss
core.description: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.
core.parameter: 000002088 | 6 | | | Daughter of the Abyss | This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Authority of the Inquisition
core.description: While this model is leading a unit, it can embark within any TRANSPORT that its Bodyguard unit can embark within.
core.parameter: 000002090 | 3 | | | Authority of the Inquisition | While this model is leading a unit, it can embark within any TRANSPORT that its Bodyguard unit can embark within. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Xenos Hunter
core.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that does not have the IMPERIUM or CHAOS keywords, add 1 to the Hit roll.
core.parameter: 000002090 | 4 | | | Xenos Hunter | While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that does not have the IMPERIUM or CHAOS keywords, add 1 to the Hit roll. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Psychic Veil (Psychic)
core.description: In your Command phase, this PSYKER can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your next Command phase, this PSYKER’s unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".
core.parameter: 000002090 | 5 | | | Psychic Veil (Psychic) | In your Command phase, this PSYKER can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your next Command phase, this PSYKER’s unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18". | Datasheet | |
